description: After briefly explaining the basic concept behind Postgres-R, this video will give an overview of the replication, sharding, and coherency approaches of the TransLattice Elastic Database (TED). We will also discuss the underlying recovery algorithm for dynamic addition and initialization of nodes along with various failure scenarios and mechanisms for improved resilience to failure.
